update.foreach: insert into buss_result_goal (user_id,team_id,customer_category_id,product_project_id,goal_month, amount_s,amount_t,amount_y,amount_c,created_at, updated_at) values (#{item.user_id},#{item.team_id},#{item.customer_category_id},#{item.product_project_id},#{item.goal_month}, #{item.amount_s},#{item.amount_t},#{item.amount_y},#{item.amount_c},#{item.created_at}, #{item.updated_at}) on duplicate key update amount_s = #{item.amount_s},amount_t = #{item.amount_t},amount_y = #{item.amount_y}, amount_c = #{item.amount_c},updated_at = #{item.updated_at}

mapper.delete:
delete from buss_result_goal where id in
#{item}
mapper.update:
update buss_result_goal
user_id = #{user_id},
team_id = #{team_id},
customer_category_id = #{customer_category_id},
product_project_id = #{product_project_id},
goal_month = #{goal_month},
amount_s = #{amount_s},
amount_t = #{amount_t},
amount_y = #{amount_y},
amount_c = #{amount_c},
updated_at = #{updated_at},
where id = #{id}

update.foreach:
update buss_result_goal
user_id = #{item.user_id},
team_id = #{item.team_id},
customer_category_id = #{item.customer_category_id},
product_project_id = #{item.product_project_id},
goal_month = #{item.goal_month},
amount_s = #{item.amount_s},
amount_t = #{item.amount_t},
amount_y = #{item.amount_y},
amount_c = #{item.amount_c},
updated_at = #{item.updated_at},
where id = #{item.id}

mapper.select: select id,user_id,team_id,customer_category_id,product_project_id, goal_month,amount_s,amount_t,amount_y,amount_c, created_at,updated_at from buss_result_goal where id = #{id}
